cells.data:
-- liftA2LR :: (a -> b -> c) -> Either d a -> Either d b -> Either d c
on liftA2LR(f, a, b)
    set x to |Right| of a
    if class of b is list then
        set y to {}
    else
        set y to |Right| of b
    end if
    
    if x is missing value then
        a
    else if y is missing value then
        b
    else
        |Right|(|Î»|(x, y) of mReturn(f))
    end if
end liftA2LR
